description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from AFC Wimbledon v Crewe Alexandra in League Two.
title: AFC Wimbledon 3-0 Crewe Alexandra
title_page: AFC Wimbledon 3-0 Crewe Alexandra: League Two stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
AFC Wimbledon and Crewe have drawn each of their last five league meetings since the Railwaymen won 3-1 in April 2022.
Crewe have both scored (10 goals) and conceded (8) in each of their five Football League visits to AFC Wimbledon, losing just once (W2 D2), although they are winless in this exact fixture in the previous three seasons (D2 L1).
No side has kept more clean sheets at home in League Two this season than AFC Wimbledon (8), who have won each of their last three home league matches without conceding.
No side has suffered fewer away defeats in League Two this season than Crewe Alexandra (3), who have lost just one of their last 11 league games on the road (W3 D7).
